Choose the artwork that will be exhibited. This can be a selection of works by a single artist, or a group of works by several artists.
Prepare the space for the exhibition. This may involve hanging or installing the artwork, and setting up any necessary lighting or other equipment.
Advertise the exhibition. This can be done through social media, flyers, or other means.
Open the exhibition to the public. This may involve setting up a schedule of opening hours, and welcoming visitors.
Close the exhibition. This may involve taking down the artwork and returning it to the artists, or storing it for future exhibitions.
